testcase.classname: Test adding report functionality in user management
testcase.name: Verify add report functionality - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on homepage...............................................passed And clicks on "PIM" in sidepanel............................................passed Then PIM page is displayed..................................................passed When Admin clicks on Reports in top bar.....................................passed Then "Employee Reports" page is been displayed..............................passed And Click on add button in reports page.....................................passed Then "Add Report" page is displayed successfully............................passed And Fill all the parameters Employee Details Report,Employee Name,Current Employees Only and Personal.passed And Admin adds first display field Employee Id to be displayed in reports...passed And Admin adds second display field Employee Last Name to be displayed in reports.passed And Admin adds second display field Gender to be displayed in reports.......passed Then Click on plus icon.....................................................passed And Click on include header toggle button...................................passed And Admin clicks on save button for reports.................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed And Report is generated for Employee Details Report.........................passed Then check report with Employee Details Report is added.....................passed
